title: Mathematics Proficiency Enhancement Course Based on Prior Knowledge Diagnosis

context.prior_knowledge: Middle school-level mathematical concepts and problem-solving procedures
context.additional_context: Combining self-directed learning with personal devices and classroom instruction, focusing on cultivating job-linked applied mathematics skills

learning_goals: Students can identify their levels of declarative knowledge (conceptual understanding) and procedural knowledge (problem-solving processes) with 80% accuracy through diagnostic assessments
Learners execute personalized learning plans to address gaps in prior knowledge with 90% or higher participation rates
By the end of the course, students show a 40% or greater improvement in procedural knowledge application for solving job-related math problems
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
